uid.description: Optional unique identifier for the logical constraint. Must be an IRI.

and.description: AND operator - all constraints must be satisfied.

or.description: OR operator - at least one constraint must be satisfied.

xone.description: XOR operator - exactly one constraint must be satisfied.

andSequence.description: AND Sequence operator - all constraints must be satisfied in order.

description: Interface for ODRL Logical Constraints. A Logical Constraint compares two or more existing Constraints by one logical operator. If the comparison returns a logical match, then the Logical Constraint is satisfied.
